T01bsu019_u:7: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
T01bsu019_u:30: anye ca dvātriṃśaddevanikāyā devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitā maheśvaranārāyaṇadevaputrapūrvaṃgamāḥ
T01bsu019_u:31: śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiścandrādityavāyuvaruṇādayo devaputrāḥ saṃnipatitāstasmin parṣadi /
T01bsu019_u:71: evaṃpramukhāṇi anekāni kinnararājaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
T01bsu019_u:125: evaṃpramukhāṇyanekāni nāgakanyā śatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni tasmin parṣadi /
T01bsu019_u:230: anekānyupāsakopāsikāśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni, anekāni ca parivrājakanirgranthaśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni //
T01bsu019_u:231: yadā mahāsaṃnipātaścābhūta, tadā avīcau mahānarake raśmayo niścaranti sma
T01bsu019_u:233: sarve te vihārapariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
T01bsu019_u:234: divyamaṇiratnopalitpāḥ (Vaidya 261) stambhāḥ pariśobhitā eva dṛśyante sma /
T01bsu019_u:236: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni dvārāṇi dṛśyante sma /
T01bsu019_u:237: layane layane suvarṇarūpyamayāni sopānāni dṛśyante sma /
T01bsu019_u:242: bahirjetavanasya purata udyāne nānāvidhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi dṛśyante sma /
T01bsu019_u:250: tena tatra ca ramyāvabhāse tādṛśāni kalpavṛkṣaśatasahasrāṇi prādurbhūtāni /
T01bsu019_u:251: tasminneva jetavanavihāre vajramayāṇi sopānāni dṛśyante sma, dvārakoṣṭhe ca muktāpaṭakalāpapralambitāni
T01bsu019_u:261: ityevaṃ tasmin jetavanavihāre samantataḥ pariśobhitāni dṛśyante sma //
T01bsu019_u:265: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto 'haṃ bhagavan /
T01bsu019_u:266: kuta ime raśmayaḥ samāgacchanti sma? kasyaiṣa tathāgatasya viṣayaprabhāvaḥ? iti /
T01bsu019_u:268: kulaputro 'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:272: bhagavan, avīcau mahānarake kāni sattvāni saṃvidyante? yatra vīcirna prajñāyate /
T01bsu019_u:273: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati - yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
T01bsu019_u:277: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto 'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante, evaṃ te sattvā (Vaidya 262)
T01bsu019_u:279: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
T01bsu019_u:280: bhagavānāha - yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā, evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati na ca punastasya kāyo 'nyathābhāvaṃ gacchati /
T01bsu019_u:283: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante - kimasminnavīcau mahānarake 'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam? yadāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
T01bsu019_u:284: praviśati, tadā tasmin śakaṭacakrapramāṇamātrāṇi padmāni prādurbhūtāni /
T01bsu019_u:287: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:288: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam
T01bsu019_u:289: - sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā
T01bsu019_u:291: yamo dharmarājastānuvāca - kiṃkāraṇaṃ yuṣmākamapi karmabhūmiḥ parikṣīṇā?
T01bsu019_u:296: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate /
T01bsu019_u:301: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede - kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ?
T01bsu019_u:302: atha maheśvarasya maharddhikasya, athavā nārāyaṇasya pañcamahāsamudranamaskṛtasya, athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi
T01bsu019_u:303: varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam? te ceha bhūmāvanuprāptāḥ?
T01bsu019_u:304: athavā rākṣasa utpannaḥ eṣa mahārāvaṇapratidvandvī? evaṃ sa tataḥ
T01bsu019_u:306: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma - īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya? atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma /
T01bsu019_u:309: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:310: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:335: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto 'bhūt //
T01bsu019_u:339: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kadā bhagavannāgacchati avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha -
T01bsu019_u:341: tatrānekāni pretaśatasahasrāṇi purastāddhāvanti sma dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthiyantravaducchritaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīcchidropamamukhaiḥ /
T01bsu019_u:343: pretanagaramupasaṃkrāmati, tadā sa pretanagaraḥ śītībhāvamanugacchati, sā ca vajrāśanirvyupaśamitā, sa ca dvārapālapurūṣa udbaddhabhiṇḍipālaḥ kālakūṭavyagrahasto lohitākṣaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:344: satatamasyānubhāvena maitracittaṃ saṃbhāvayati - na ca me īdṛśena karmabhūminā kṛtyam //
T01bsu019_u:345: athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ ca sattvanikāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahākaruṇācittamutpādya daśabhyo hastāṅgulībhyo daśa vaitaraṇīrniṣkrāmayati /
T01bsu019_u:347: atikaruṇābhibhūtacetasā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya teṣāṃ sattvānāmantike sarvaromakūpebhyo 'ṣṭāṅgavāriparipūrṇā mahānadyo niṣkrāmanti /
T01bsu019_u:352: tadā mānuṣikīṃ cetanāmupādāyaiva sāṃsārikīṃ cintāṃ vicintayanti - aho bata te jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ sukhitāḥ, ye śītalāṃ chāyāṃ parisevanti /
T01bsu019_u:355: sukhitāste satpuruṣā ye kalyāṇamitraṃ satatasamitamanveṣayanti, parigrahaṃ paripālayanti /
T01bsu019_u:356: te satpurūṣāḥ sacetanā ye mahāyānaṃ satatasamitamavagāhayanti /
T01bsu019_u:357: te satpuruṣā ye āryāstān gomārgāya vāsamupavasanti /
T01bsu019_u:359: te satpuruṣāḥ ye truṭitasphuṭitān vihārān pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti, pratiṣṭhāpayanti /
T01bsu019_u:360: te satpuruṣā ye pūrvikāni stūpabimbāni truṭitasphuṭitāni viśīrṇabhūtāni pratisaṃskāraṃ kurvanti
T01bsu019_u:361: te satpuruṣā ye dharmabhāṇakāṃllekhakān dhārakān vācakān sūtrarājasya śrāvakān satatasamitaṃ parisevanti copatiṣṭhanti ca /
T01bsu019_u:362: te satpurūṣā ye tathāgataprātihāryāṇi vividhāni ca tathāgatacaṃkramaṇāni dharmasarāṇi ca paśyanti
T01bsu019_u:365: te satpuruṣā ye bodhisattvavikurvitāni caṃkramaṇāni paśyanti /
T01bsu019_u:366: ityevaṃ te pretaviṣayaṃ śarīramanuvicintya mānasānāṃ kāmānāmabhāvopapattiṃ prati parityajanti
T01bsu019_u:368: tadā teṣāṃ viṃśatiśikhara samudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ ākāṅkṣitamukhā nāma bodhisattvā upapannāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:369: athāvalokiteśvaro yadā te sattvadhātavaḥ parimokṣitāḥ suparimuktāśca, yadā te sarvasattvā
T01bsu019_u:374: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - bhagavana, adyāpi nāgacchatyavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - anekāni kulaputra sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paripācayati dine dine sa āgatya paripācayati /
T01bsu019_u:375: nāsti kulaputra īdṛśaṃ pratibhānaṃ tathāgatānāmapi yādṛśamāryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
T01bsu019_u:376: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - kena prakāreṇa bhagavan? bhagavānāha -
T01bsu019_u:377: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaniṣkambhin sugandhamukho nāma vaṇikputro 'bhūvam
T01bsu019_u:378: / tadā me śrutā vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā //
T01bsu019_u:379: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī tvayā bhagavan
T01bsu019_u:382: prabodhaya, yādṛśī tvayā bhagavan guṇodbhāvanā āryāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā //
T01bsu019_u:385: brahmādayaḥ, hṛdayānnārāyaṇaḥ, daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ sarasvatī, mukhato vāyavo jātāḥ, dharaṇī pādābhyām, varuṇaścodarāt /
T01bsu019_u:386: yadaite devā jātā āryāvalokiteśvarasya kāyāt, athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T01bsu019_u:387: maheśvaraṃ devaputrametadavocat - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ maheśvaraḥ kaliyuge pratipanne /
T01bsu019_u:389: kartāram, te sarvasattvā bodhimārgeṇa viprahīṇā bhaviṣyanti, ya īdṛśapṛthagjaneṣu sattveṣu sāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti //
T01bsu019_u:392: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra vipaśyinastathāgatasya sakāśādāryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā
T01bsu019_u:393: tadapyatikramya śikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān tena kālena tena samayenāhaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
T01bsu019_u:394: tasya śikhinastathāgatasya sakāśādavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsatvasya guṇodbhāvanā śrutā //
T01bsu019_u:398: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśī bhagavaṃstvayā guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya śrutā? bhagavānāha - yadā sarvadevā nāgā
T01bsu019_u:399: yakṣā gandharvā rākṣasā asurā maruto garūḍā gandharvāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā abhūvan, tadā bhagavān /
T01bsu019_u:400: mahāsaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāsāṃ parṣadāṃ madhye dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:401: tadā bhagavato mukhadvārānnānāvarṇā anekaraśmayo niḥsaranti sma /
T01bsu019_u:404: niścaritvā ca daśadigvidikṣu sarvān lokān dhātunavabhāsya punarevāgatya taṃ śikhinaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mukhadvāre praviṣṭāḥ //
T01bsu019_u:409: atha tasminneva parṣadi ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat (Vaidya 266) kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan, īdṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam?
T01bsu019_u:411: lokadhātorāgacchati, tasya āgacchamānasyedaṃ mayedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ darśitam //
T01bsu019_u:412: atha ratnapāṇirnāma bodhisattva āha - kīdṛśāni tāni nimittāni? darśayatu bhagavān /
T01bsu019_u:413: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati, tadā vividhāni kalpavṛkṣā vistaranti, cūtavṛkṣā
T01bsu019_u:414: vistaranti, kundapuṣpāṇi satataṃ jāyante, campakavṛkṣā abhinamanti /
T01bsu019_u:417: vividhāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti, ratnavarṣāṇi ca pravarṣanti,
T01bsu019_u:425: yadā āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sukhāvatyā lokadhātorniṣkrāntaḥ, tadā sarvapṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā //
T01bsu019_u:426: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kasya nimittāni bhagavan? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra āryāvalokiteśvaro
T01bsu019_u:427: mahāsattvo bodhisattva āgacchati, tasyaiṣa śubhanimittamīdṛśaṃ prādurbhūtam /
T01bsu019_u:428: yadā sa calati tadā manoramaṃ padmavarṣaḥ patati /
T01bsu019_u:429: tadā avalokiteśvaro sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇadaṇḍāni vaidūryanirbhāsāni gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:430: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavatastāni padmānyupanāmayati sma - imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prahitāni /
T01bsu019_u:431: sa tathāgataḥ pṛcchati anātaṅkatāṃ laghutāṃ sukhasparśavihāritāṃ ca /
T01bsu019_u:432: tato bhagavatā padmāni gṛhītvā vāmapārśve sthāpitāni /
T01bsu019_u:433: tadā aryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ kurute - kīdṛśī tvayā avalokiteśvara
T01bsu019_u:435: kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu sattveṣu, hāhe tapane pretāyane mahānarake,
T01bsu019_u:436: agnighaṭe mahānarake, śālmalimahānarake, andhakāle mahānarake, śītodake mahānarake - evaṃ cānyeṣvapi? mahānarake ye upapannāḥ sattvāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mayā sattvaparipāko me kṛtaḥ kartavyaśca /
T01bsu019_u:437: kṛtvā sarve ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:438: na ca tāvat tvayānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhavyā, yāvatsamantāddaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvākṣaṇopapannāḥ sattvā arūpaviśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau na pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ //
T01bsu019_u:439: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṃ praśnavyāhāraṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakāntaḥ, prakramitvā jvalannivāgnipiṇḍa ākāśe
T01bsu019_u:445: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paripṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavan praśnavyāharaṇamuddeśam - kidṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ? bhagavānāha - śṛṇu kulaputra /
T01bsu019_u:446: nirdeśayāmi asyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇāt puṇyasaṃbhārasya pramāṇam /
T01bsu019_u:447: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra kecideva sattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
T01bsu019_u:450: bhavanti, yaśca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ prabhavati,
T01bsu019_u:452: tadyathā - api nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa caturmahādvīpeṣu rātriṃdivamavicchinnaṃ devo varṣati, tacchakyamekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:453: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyaṃ mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:455: gāmbhīryeṇa, aprameyo vaipulyena, vaḍavāmukhaparyantam, tanmayā śakyamekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:456: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:457: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu ye keciccatuṣpādā siṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣumṛgoṣṭraśṛgālādayo gogardabhāḥ paśavaḥ hastino 'śvā
T01bsu019_u:458: mahiṣā mārjārādayaḥ, eteṣu catuṣpadeṣu śakyate mayaikaikaṃ romaṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:459: / na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:460: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā paramāṇurajopamāstathāgatā arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayeddhastaśatasahasrapramāṇam, kārayitvā caikadine dhyānāvaropaṇaṃ kuryāt, tacchakyaṃ mayā kulaputra teṣāṃ sauvarṇarajatamayānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ karaṇeṣu puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:461: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:462: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikaṃ patrāṇi gaṇayitum, na tvavalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:463: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturmahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve srotāpattiphale sakṛdāgāmiphale 'nāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratyekabodhau niyojayeyam /
T01bsu019_u:469: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - na me bhagavana kvacidīdṛśaḥ acintyastathāgatānāṃ puṇyaskandho dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya, yādṛśo bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya
T01bsu019_u:473: te caikasthāne (Vaidya 268) dhārayeyuḥ satkārāya divyakalpacīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ, te ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sarvathaikatra saṃnipātyante /
T01bsu019_u:474: sarve avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na śankuvanti puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:475: prāgeva kulaputra ahamekākī asmin lokadhātau viharāmi, tatkathaṃ śaknuyāṃ tasya puṇyaskandhaṃ vācā vyāhartum? api ca kulaputra sarve tathāgatā daśabhyo vāgbhiḥ evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - te sattvāḥ sukhitā loke bhavanti, ye avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya
T01bsu019_u:477: te jarāmaraṇavyādhiśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyebhyaḥ parimuktā bhavanti, te āpaścimasāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ nānubhavanti, te śuklapāṇḍarapaṭā iva
T01bsu019_u:478: rājahaṃsāḥ plutavāyuvegā iva gacchanti sukhāvatīlokadhātumamitābhasya tathāgatasya saṃmukhaṃ dharmaśravaṇāya /
T01bsu019_u:479: dharmaṃ śrutvā ca sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ teṣāṃ kāye na bādhate, na ca rāgadveṣamohena jarāmaraṇam, na ca teṣāṃ kṣutpipāsā duḥkhaṃ kāye na bādhate, na ca te
T01bsu019_u:481: dharmarasena pūryamāṇāḥ satataparigrahaṃ vyavasthāpitāḥ tāvadasmiṃllokadhātau tiṣṭhanti, yāvadavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya dṛḍhapratijñā na paripūritā bhavati - sarvasattvā sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimokṣitāḥ
T01bsu019_u:483: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamena kālena bhagavato 'sya dṛḍhapratijñāṃ paripūrayati, sarvasattvāśca mokṣamārge pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyuḥ? bhagavānāha - bahubhiḥ kulaputra kāraṇaiḥ sattvāḥ kāraṇāt saṃsāre saṃsaranti, devatā sattvān paripācayati, teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhimārgamupadarśayati /
T01bsu019_u:484: yena yena rupeṇa vaineyāḥ sattvāḥ, tena tena rupeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu019_u:505: yathā yathā vaineyānāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā tathā (Vaidya 269) rūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu019_u:506: evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvān dharmaṃ
T01bsu019_u:513: na ca me kadācidasmābhirīdṛśo viṣayo dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā, yādṛśo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viṣayaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:515: bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra asminneva jambudvīpe vajrakukṣirnāma guhā /
T01bsu019_u:517: tatra kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo 'surarūpeṇāsurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu019_u:519: dharmaśravaṇāyāgatānasurānevaṃ ca kathayati sma - asurāṇāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:520: ye cānye 'suraparṣadaste maitracittāḥ śāntacittāḥ dayācittāḥ sattvānāmantike hitasukhacittā bhāvaṃ samanvāhṛtya imaṃ
T01bsu019_u:524: te sukhitā loke ye īdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇisadṛśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ
T01bsu019_u:527: dhārayiṣyanti, vācayiṣyanti, pūjayiṣyanti, cintayiṣyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, bhāvayiṣyanti, paramaprītyā gauraveṇādhyāśayena ca namaskurvanti /
T01bsu019_u:530: maraṇakāle dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramiṣyanti, te ca sarve tathāgatā āśvāsayiṣyanti - mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra, tvayā kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śrutam /
T01bsu019_u:532: tatra sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau tavārthe vicitraṃ ca te chatraṃ sihāsanaṃ sajjīkṛtam, divyamaulīkuṇḍalasragdāmamīdṛśasya
T01bsu019_u:534: evaṃ sa ratnapāṇe prativiśiṣṭataraṃ puṇyaphalaṃ darśayannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nirvāṇikīṃ bhūmimupadarśayati sma /
T01bsu019_u:536: atha ratnapāṇirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ
T01bsu019_u:540: athe sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - atidurlabhaṃ bhagavan asyāvalokiteśvarasya vikurvitāni śrūyante guṇodbhāvanāni ca /
T01bsu019_u:542: - api ca kulaputra tasmād (Vaidya 270) vajrakukṣeryadā niṣkrāntaḥ,
T01bsu019_u:543: kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ, tadā guṇodbhāvanāṃ śṛṇu /
T01bsu019_u:546: samyaksaṃbuddho babhūva vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
T01bsu019_u:547: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kṣāntivādī ṛṣirabhūt girigahvarāntarakarvaṭasthānavāsī, manuṣyāṇāmavacare pṛthivīpradeśe vyaharan /
T01bsu019_u:548: tadā kālānukālaṃ mayā tasya viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasya sakāśāt guṇodbhāvanā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrutā vividhasarvasattvaparipācanam /
T01bsu019_u:549: asti sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin sā kāñcanamayī nāma bhūmirasti yaduttarasyāṃ kāñcanamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ gatvā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T01bsu019_u:552: sa tataḥ kāñcanamayyā bhūmyā niṣkramitvā rūpyamayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati /
T01bsu019_u:553: tatra sa paśyati catuṣpādikāni sattvāni puruṣapudgalāni /
T01bsu019_u:554: dṛṣṭvā teṣāmavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sarvasattvānāmeva dharmaṃ deśayati - śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ sarve
T01bsu019_u:557: athe te sarve puruṣā avalokiteśvarasya purataḥ sthitvā etadavocat -
T01bsu019_u:561: aśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ mātāpitṛbhūto bhava /
T01bsu019_u:563: sacetaka, mahākaruṇayā mokṣamārgasyopadarśaka, sukhitāste sattvā ye tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ nāmamanusmaranti, udīrayanti ca /
T01bsu019_u:564: idaṃ ca samāgāḍhataraṃ duḥkhaṃ na kadācitpratyanubhavanti, muñcanti te hīdṛśaṃ
T01bsu019_u:566: atha sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nama mahāyanasūtraratnarājaṃ karṇapuṭe niścārayati sma
T01bsu019_u:567: te ca sattvā amuṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā anyonyavihitaśrotṛkarṇapuṭā niścaranti sma /
T01bsu019_u:568: tadapi te puruṣāḥ śrutvā avaivartikabhūminiṣpāditāḥ paramasukhasamarpitāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ //
T01bsu019_u:569: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyā rūpamayyā niṣkramyānyatarāyāṃ bhūmyāṃ praviśati sattvaparipākāya mahākaruṇāsaṃpīḍitahṛdayo 'yomayyāṃ bhūmyāṃ yatra sa rājā balirasurendro baddhaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:571: upasaṃkramya ca rājño balerasurendrasya dūrataścakṣurdarśanaṃ yāti sma suvarṇabimbamiva raśmibhiḥ pramuñcamānairnānāvarṇaiḥ //
T01bsu019_u:575: atha sa rājā balirasurendro 'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ paśyati sma /
T01bsu019_u:576: dṛṣṭvā ca sāntaḥpuraparivāraiḥ sārdhamanekairasuraśatasahasraiḥ kubjavāmanakādibhiḥ sahasraparivārairgatvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādayornipatyedamudānayati sma -
T01bsu019_u:578: adya me saphalaṃ janma jīvitaṃ puṇyameva ca /
T01bsu019_u:579: adya me hīdṛśaṃ caiva paripūrṇaṃ manoratham // Kvyu_1,11.1 //
T01bsu019_u:580: adya me āśayaḥ pūrṇaḥ pariśuddhaśca duḥkhataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:581: yanmayā darśane samyag dṛṣṭvā lokaikabāndhavaḥ // Kvyu_1,11.2 //
T01bsu019_u:582: tadā me sarvasaukhyaṃ ca kāme saṃtiṣṭhate punaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:583: saukhyā bhavanti te sattvā sarvaduḥkhavivarjitāḥ // Kvyu_1,11.3 //
T01bsu019_u:587: atha sa rājā balistasya bhagavato 'valokiteśvarasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya ratnapīṭhakaṃ dattvā daśanakhāñjaliṃ kṛtvaivamāha -
T01bsu019_u:589: bhagavan, niṣīdasva asminnāsane, anugrahaṃ kuru, pāparatānāṃ jātyandhabhūtānāṃ paradāragamanaprasaktānāṃ prāṇātipātodyuktānāṃ paraprāṇāhiṃsakānāṃ jarāmaraṇabhayabhītānāmudvignamānasānāṃ
T01bsu019_u:594: eṣāmasmākaṃ bandhanabaddhānāṃ tava darśanena sarvabandhanādayaḥ parimuktāḥ, sphuṭitāḥ dūrāddūrataraṃ palāyanti /
T01bsu019_u:595: tvaddarśanamātreṇa yāni tāni rājñaścakravartinaśca śubhakarmajātāni cakravartisukhāni mama saṃvidyante, tatsa bhagavan tādṛśaṃ dharmamārgamupadarśaya, yenaivaṃ punareva bandhanaduḥkhaṃ na pratyanubhavema /
T01bsu019_u:596: na ca punarimāni yāni sarvabandhanāni cakṣuṣu ābhāsamāgaccheyuḥ //
T01bsu019_u:597: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - ye mahārāja
T01bsu019_u:599: kāropakāraṃ bahutaraṃ kurvanti, na ca teṣāṃ kecitsattvāḥ svapnenāpi pīḍayanti /
T01bsu019_u:601: likhāpayanti, antato nāmadheyamapi, asmāddharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti, asya bodhisattvasyaikamapi piṇḍapātramanuprayacchanti, teṣāṃ ca dharmabhāṇakānāmasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakānāṃ vācakānāṃ lekhakānāṃ saṃśrāvakāṇām, asya ca tathāgatasya dharmaparyāyamuddiśya ekadivasamapi purobhaktamapi piṇḍapātramanupradāsyati, te sarve cakravartirājyalābhino
T01bsu019_u:608: tathāgatasya purataḥ saṃmukhaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyanti /
T01bsu019_u:611: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ye tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tiṣṭhataḥ parinirvṛtasya
T01bsu019_u:613: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra (Vaidya 272) dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamā mama sadṛśā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaveyuḥ, te caikasthāne dhārayeyurdivyakalpatatpuṇyapramāṇamudgrahītuṃ sarvasukhopadhānena samupatiṣṭhamānāḥ, te 'pi sarve samagrībhūtā na śakyante ekasya piṇḍaprātrapradānasya kuśalamūlasaṃbhārasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:615: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum /
T01bsu019_u:616: na tu kulaputra śakyaṃ mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:617: tadyathāpi nama kulaputra caturṣu mahādvīpeṣu strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaste sarve kṛṣikarmānte udyuktā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:622: sarve te strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ pīṭhakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ sarve te mardayitvā tasmin mahākhalake mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ kuryāt /
T01bsu019_u:625: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:626: / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi
T01bsu019_u:630: ye caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ puruṣadārakadārikāste ca sarve lekhakā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:633: na tu kulaputra śakyate piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:634: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra lekhakāḥ sarve te daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ paryāpannāḥ
T01bsu019_u:635: yacca teṣāṃ daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ tamekasya piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:636: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra gaṅgāyā nadyā vālukāsamudrasya ca śakyaṃ mayā ekaikaṃ vālukāṃ
T01bsu019_u:637: gaṇayitum, na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:638: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā sarvamaturāsrāṃ(?)
T01bsu019_u:640: na śakyaṃ mayā kulaputra piṇḍapātrasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum //
T01bsu019_u:641: atha balisurendraḥ idaṃ ca tasya bhagavato
T01bsu019_u:643: sukṣetrāvarūḍhabījapātrabhūtasya nirdeśyamānasya tatsarvamanumodya sāśrudurdinavadano gadgadakaṇṭhaḥ bāṣpaparipūrṇa ucchvasan avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ mayā bhagavan balinā karma kṛtaṃ dānaṃ dattam, yenehaiva janmani bandhanamanuprāptam? sāntaḥ puraparivāreṇa kukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattam /
T01bsu019_u:647: yadā mayā ca bhagavan tairthikadṛṣṭiparyāpannena mānagrastamānasena ca yajñaṃ yajatā mahādānasamucchrayaṃ kartumārabdham, tadā me tatra yajñe vāmanakarūpeṇa yācanako hiṃsraḥ samāgataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:648: tasya me maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmāni ratnābharaṇāni hyaśvarathādīni muktvā ratnakavacāni marakatapralambitāni (Vaidya 273) cāmarapralambitāni muktāhārāṇi muktikājālapralambitāni
T01bsu019_u:652: kumārīṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi paramayā gurvaruṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatānāṃ nānāvicitrāṇāṃ kanyālakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtānāṃ paramarūpaśobhamānāmapsarasāmapi pratispardhinīnāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmaparikṣepikāṇāṃ keyūrakaṭakanūpurakaṭimekhalāhastottaryā karṇapṛṣṭhottaryā
T01bsu019_u:653: hastāṅgulīyasamāyuktānāṃ sarasarāyamāṇamālāsamāyuktānāṃ nānāraṅgoparaktavastraprāvṛtānām, (anyāni) ratnapīṭhaśatasahasrāṇyanekāni suvarṇarāśirūpyarāśīni ratnarāśīni sthāpitāni /
T01bsu019_u:658: anekāni suvarṇarūpyamayāni daṇḍāni ratnasaṃyuktāni satataṃ vyavasthāpitāni /
T01bsu019_u:662: tasmin sa mayā rājñā śatasahasrān saṃnipatitān brāhmaṇaśatasahasraṃ saṃnipatitam /
T01bsu019_u:664: tadāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ sthānasthitānāṃ yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayamāpannaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:668: kṣātriyabhāryāṇāṃ gurviṇīnāṃ yāvaddhṛdayaṃ sphuṭayitvā kumārakumārikā jīvitādvayaparopitāḥ
T01bsu019_u:669: tataste ca mahākṣatriyāḥ sarve mayā haḍanigaḍabandhanairbaddhāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:670: nītvā tāmraguhāyāmanekāni kṣatriyaśatasahasrāṇi pañcabandhanabaddhāni kṛtvā sthāpitāni pañcapāṇḍavaprabhṛtīni
T01bsu019_u:671: tasyāmeva yakṣaguhāyāmupayamāni kīlakāni śṛṅkhalāsamāyuktāni teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hastapādāni baddhvā sthāpitāni /
T01bsu019_u:673: prathamaṃ dvāraṃ kāṣṭhamayam, dvitīyaṃ dvāraṃ khadiramayam, tṛtīyaṃ dvāramayomayam, caturthaṃ dvāraṃ tāmramayam,
T01bsu019_u:674: pañcamaṃ dvāraṃ rūpyamayam, ṣaṣṭhaṃ dvāraṃ suvarṇamayam, saptamaṃ dvāraṃ ratnamayam /
T01bsu019_u:676: ekaikadvāre pañca pañca śatāni kapāṭāni yantrasamāyuktāni /
T01bsu019_u:682: kvaciddivase bhramararūpeṇa, kvaciddivase varāharūpeṇa, kvaciddivase mānuṣarūpeṇa /
T01bsu019_u:683: rūpaṃ kṛtvā dine dine mṛgapakṣyādinā nānājanturūpeṇa /
T01bsu019_u:686: tadātra me daśarathaputreṇāvatāraprekṣiṇā gatvā tena dvārasthāpitāḥ sapta parvatā utpāṭitāḥ
T01bsu019_u:687: utpāṭayitvā laghunīvānyapradeśe chorayitvā uccaiḥśabdena teṣāṃ kṣatriyāṇāmārocayati (Vaidya 274) sma yudhiṣṭhiranakulasahadevabhīmasenārjunakauravādibhiḥ /
T01bsu019_u:688: anye rājānaḥ śabdamanuśrutaṃ śrutvā samāśvāsya svasthakāyā vyavasthitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:689: sa ca tānevamāha - jīvanto yuṣmākamathavā mṛtāḥ? te kathayanti - jīvāmo bhagavan /
T01bsu019_u:690: tena mahāvīryeṇa puruṣeṇa sarvāṇi tāni dvārāṇi bhagnāni /
T01bsu019_u:691: yāvattāmraguhāyāṃ paśyati, sarve te rājāno bandhanabaddhāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:692: dṛṣṭvā ca nārāyaṇaṃ sarve te parasparaṃ vicintayanti - atha balirasurendro mṛtaḥ
T01bsu019_u:693: kālagataḥ? athavā punarapi maraṇakālo 'smākaṃ bhūtaḥ? atha te kathayanti -
T01bsu019_u:694: varamasmākaṃ saṃgrāmabhūmīmaraṇaṃ na tu bandhanabaddhānāṃ maraṇam /
T01bsu019_u:695: yadā bandhanabaddhāḥ kālaṃ kuryāma, tadā kṣatriyadharmamasmākaṃ vinaśyati /
T01bsu019_u:696: yadā saṃgrāmabhūmau kālaṃ kuryāma, tadā svargopagā vayaṃ bhavema //
T01bsu019_u:697: atha te rājānaḥ sarve svakaṃ svakaṃ gṛhaṃ gatāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:699: yadā te rathaṃ sajjīkurvanti mahārhāṇi śastrāṇi, tadā daśarathaputreṇa vāmanakarūpamabhinirmāya mṛgājinenottarya veṇudaṇḍamupagṛhya pīṭhikāmupagṛhya saṃprasthito matsakāśam /
T01bsu019_u:701: / dvārapālairanubaddhaḥ - mā praviśa vāmanaka brāhmaṇa iti /
T01bsu019_u:705: atha sa dvārapālapuruṣo gatvā balimārocayati - deva, āgataste vāmanako brāhmaṇaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:706: atha sa balistametadavocat - kīdṛśaṃ vastu yācate? atha sa dvārapālastametadavocat - deva na tamanujānāmi /
T01bsu019_u:707: atha sa balistametadavocat - gacchantu bhavantaḥ, ānīyatāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:713: sa taṃ balimetadavocat - eṣa kālapuruṣo 'vapraviṣṭaḥ, avaśyaṃ te vighāto bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu019_u:714: balistametadavocat - kathaṃ jānāsi bhagavan? śukra uvāca - jānāmyahaṃ tasya nimittāni cihnāni ca dṛṣṭvā /
T01bsu019_u:715: balirāha - kimupāyaṃ vayaṃ kuryāmaḥ? atha nārāyaṇena vicintya
T01bsu019_u:719: kīdṛśamabhiprāyo bhavataḥ? sa praviśyaitadavocat - dvipadabhūmī yācayāmi /
T01bsu019_u:720: baliruvāca - yadi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa dvipadaṃ yācase, mayā trīṇi padāni te 'nupradattāni /
T01bsu019_u:721: sa pratigrahaṃ tasyopagṛhya svastimupavadyānugṛhītaṃ tena tilapānīyasuvarṇasahitam /
T01bsu019_u:723: atha śukro balimetadavocat - rājan kathitaṃ mayā kālapuruṣa eṣa praviṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:724: na ca tvayā pramāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vacanam /
T01bsu019_u:731: kiṃ kṛtya(?) svahastena mayā viṣaṃ bhakṣitam /
T01bsu019_u:734: tadā sa kathayati - tṛtīyasya padaṃ na saṃvidyate /
T01bsu019_u:735: yanmama pratigrahaṃ yācitam, kīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ karomyaham? atha nārāyaṇastametadavocat - yatrāhaṃ sthāpayāmi tatra tvayā sthātavyam /
T01bsu019_u:736: (Vaidya 275) atha sa balirasurendrastametadavocat - yādṛśaṃ tvayājñaptaṃ tādṛśaṃ karomyaham
T01bsu019_u:737: satyaṃ kuruṣe? sa kathayati - satyaṃ satyaṃ karomyaham /
T01bsu019_u:741: tā api ca kumārikāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravairvidhvaṃsitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:742: tāni ca suvarṇamayāni siṃhāsanāni divyāni cchatrāṇyupānahāni ratnapariveṣṭitāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca suvarṇaghaṇṭāni suvarṇakaṭakāni ratnakhacitāni kapilāni kauravapāṇḍavairvidhvaṃsitāni sā ca yajñabhūmirvināśitā //
T01bsu019_u:743: atha sa balirasurendro yajñabhūmerniṣkrāntaḥ śarīracintāmāpede - dātā balirudārayajñamupāsya
T01bsu019_u:747: yathaiva kartā sartā sa nītvā pātālamupasthāpitaḥ sāntaḥpuraparivāraḥ /
T01bsu019_u:748: ākhyātaṃ hi mayā bhagavan - bhūtapūrvaṃ kurukṣetre mayā dānaṃ dattaṃ tasyaitatkarmaphalamanubhavāmi
T01bsu019_u:751: atha balistaṃ bhagavantamāryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ stotraviśeṣaiḥ stotumārabdhaḥ - trāṇaṃ bhavāhi śubhapadmahasta /
T01bsu019_u:773: mucyante te kārasūtrai rauravopapanneṣu avīcyupapanneṣu pretanagaropapanneṣu ye tava nāmadheyamanusmaranti
T01bsu019_u:779: bhaviṣyasi tvamasurendra śrīrnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T01bsu019_u:780: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
T01bsu019_u:782: tatra tava buddhakṣetre na rāgaśabdo na dveṣaśabdo na mohaśabdo bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu019_u:785: śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramupanāmitaṃ maulīkuṇḍalaṃ ca nānāratnasamuccitamupanāmitaṃ ca //
T01bsu019_u:786: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro dharmadeśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇu mahārāja /
T01bsu019_u:787: nitye dhruve śāśvate mānuṣyake ye cintayanti satataparigrahaṃ mahābhogānyanuvicintayanti dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyān, yāni ca mahārhāṇi
T01bsu019_u:794: yadā prāṇoddharaṇaṃ bhavati, tadā jambudvīpaṃ viparītaṃ paśyati /
T01bsu019_u:796: ye ca mahārhā vṛkṣāstān pradīptān saprajvalitānekajvālībhūtān paśyanti /
T01bsu019_u:799: tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ kṣuradhāropacite mahāpathe pādā viśīryante /
T01bsu019_u:800: utkṣipte pāde ye 'nyāḥ pādāḥ prādurbhavanti, anekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvānādibhirbhakṣyante /
T01bsu019_u:802: tataḥ kṣuradhāropacitānmahāpathādavatīrya yatra ṣoḍaśāṅgulipramāṇāni kaṇṭakāni tatrānīyate, tata ekaikapāde pañca
T01bsu019_u:804: sa cākrandanti - viṣayapāparatena sattvena karma kṛtam //
T01bsu019_u:805: atha te yamapālapuruṣā evamāhuḥ - mārṣāḥ, na tvayā tathāgatasya
T01bsu019_u:809: na ca tvayā kvaciddānāni dīyamānāni dṛṣṭvānumoditāni
T01bsu019_u:810: / na ca tvayā kvacit pradeśe stūpabimbāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtāni /
T01bsu019_u:811: sa kathayati - aśrāddho 'bhūvaṃ pāparato buddhadharmasaṃghaparivarjitaḥ pāpamitraparigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraparivarjitaśca /
T01bsu019_u:815: athe te yamapuruṣā nītvā kālasūtre mahānarake kṣipanti /
T01bsu019_u:816: śikṣā caikaikaśaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati, dvitīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye
T01bsu019_u:817: vidhyanti tadapi jīvati, tṛtīyaṃ śaktiśataṃ kāye vidhyanti tadapi jīvati /
T01bsu019_u:818: yadā kalaṃ na kurvanti tadāgnikhadāmadhye kṣipanti /
T01bsu019_u:821: teṣāmīṣṭamapi dantāni viśīryante, tālūni visphuṭante, kaṇṭhamapi tālumapi hṛdayamapi
T01bsu019_u:822: yantravatkalā nigaḍāyamānā sarvaṃ taṃ kāyaṃ dahyante /
T01bsu019_u:823: evameva hā rājan na kaścit trātā bhaviṣyati paraloke /
T01bsu019_u:824: tasmāttarhi taṃ mahārāja yatnena puṇyaṃ kartavyam /
T01bsu019_u:825: evaṃ sānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā ca taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendramevamāha - apramattena bhavitavyam, na punaḥ kadācitpramādacāriṇā bhavitavyam /
T01bsu019_u:830: mamāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvato niravaśeṣāṇi pāpaskandhāni na ca supariśuddhāni /
T01bsu019_u:833: tatra ca tava saptaratnamayaṃ padmāsanaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu019_u:834: yatra ratnapadme niṣadya tasya bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikāt imaṃ sarvaduḥkhapāpaskandhaṃ pāpaśamanaṃ sarvadurgatisādhanaṃ anantamaṇimahāpuṇyanirdeśaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānaṃ
T01bsu019_u:835: sūtraratnarājaṃ tvaṃ śroṣyasi, śrutvā ca tatraiva vyākaraṇamanuprāpsyase anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, tāvatsupariśuddhabodhicittālaṃkāraṃ nāma bodhisattvajanma pratilapsyase /
T01bsu019_u:838: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya ca balerasurendrasya imaṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhanaṃ bodhisattvālaṃkārakāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma dharmālokaṃ deśayitvā taṃ rājānaṃ balimasurendraṃ samāśvāsya idamavocat -
T01bsu019_u:847: tadā te devā nāgā yakṣā rākṣasā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:849: atha teṣāṃ bodhisattvenāṃ madhye gaganagañjo nāma bodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavane viharati,
T01bsu019_u:853: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena paśyeyamahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra ihaivāgacchatyavalokiteśvaraḥ /
T01bsu019_u:854: yadā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkrāntaḥ, tadā jetavane
T01bsu019_u:855: divyāni puṣpavarṣāṇi patanti, divyāni kalpavṛkṣaśatāni paramaśobhanīyāni,
T01bsu019_u:857: pralambitāni, kāśikavastrasaccīvarāṇi pralambitāni, lohitadaṇḍāni suvarṇarūpyapatrāṇi anekāni puṣpavṛkṣaśatāni anekāni puṣkariṇīśatāni
T01bsu019_u:859: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - nāgacchati bhagavannavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra tato balerasurendrasya bhavanānniṣkamya paramabhīṣaṇīyaṃ
T01bsu019_u:860: tamondhakāraṃ nāma pṛthivīpradeśaṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ bhūmiṃ amanuṣyāvacaramapṛthivīpradeśaṃ tatra gacchati /
T01bsu019_u:861: yatra kulaputra candrādityau na jñāyete, tatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe varado nāma cintāmaṇiratnarājo 'sti /
T01bsu019_u:864: yadāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati, tadā darśanamātrātsarvayakṣarākṣasāḥ paramahṛṣṭatuṣṭāḥ pramuditahṛdayā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:866: purastāddhāvanti, nirdhāvanti, dhāvitvā pādayoḥ praṇipatya saṃbhāṣayanti -
T01bsu019_u:867: mā tvaṃ bhagavan śrāntaklānto yastvaṃ cirakālena dṛṣṭaḥ, yastvamasyāṃ tamondhakārāyāṃ bhumau viharasi /
T01bsu019_u:871: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasā divyasuvarṇaratnamayaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prasamayanti tasyāvalokiteśvarasyārthe vicitraiḥ puṣpamayaiḥ saṃchāditam, yatra ca bhagavānniṣadya dharmaṃ deśayati /
T01bsu019_u:872: sa tairyakṣarākṣasairnītvā tatra divyasuvarṇaratnamaye siṃhāsane viśrāmitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:873: tataḥ avalokiteśvarasteṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ dharma deśayati - śṛṇvattu bhavantaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:874: āryakāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ ye śroṣyanti, śrutvā ca dhārayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti, yoniśaṃ ca manasi
T01bsu019_u:876: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgrahītum, na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:877: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā mahāsamudrasyaikamudakabinduṃ gaṇayitum, na tu kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ mayā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:878: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ dvādaśagaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhādvādaśakalpānekasthāne
T01bsu019_u:881: 'pi tathāgatāḥ sarve sahitā bhūtvā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya catuṣpādikāyā api gāthāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayituṃ na śaknuvanti sma, prāgevāhamekākī tamondhakārabhūmau viharāmi
T01bsu019_u:882: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāścaturmahādvīpeṣvekaikadvīpapramāṇaṃ gṛhaṃ vihāraṃ vā kārayeddivyasuvarṇaratnamayam, tatra gṛhe vihāre vā stūpasahasraṃ kuryāt, teṣāṃ caikadine dhātvāvaropaṇaṃ kuryāt, yacca teṣāṃ dhātvāvaropaṇeṣu pūjāyāṃ puṇyaskandham, tato bahutaraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhasya
T01bsu019_u:884: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañca mahānadyo sahasranadīparivārā
T01bsu019_u:887: atha te yakṣarākṣasā avalokiteśvarametadavocan - ye sattvāḥ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ
T01bsu019_u:889: bhavati? sa āha - aprameyaṃ teṣāṃ kulaputrāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prabhavati /
T01bsu019_u:893: te sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ janayanti /
T01bsu019_u:897: yatra yatropapadyante, tatra tatra jātau jātau jātismarā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:902: na kadācit yakṣatvaṃ na rākṣasatvaṃ na pretatvaṃ na piśācatvaṃ na pūtanātvaṃ na kaṭapūtanātvaṃ na manuṣyadāridryaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
T01bsu019_u:903: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sevāpuṇyaskandhena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
T01bsu019_u:904: ye 'pi kecit kulaputrāḥ sattvā asmāt kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājādekākṣaramapi nāmadheyamapi
T01bsu019_u:905: catuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ likhāpayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi
T01bsu019_u:911: teṣāṃ na kaścit kāye vyādhiḥ prabhaviṣyati /
T01bsu019_u:912: na cakṣurogaṃ na śrotrarogaṃ na ghrāṇarogaṃ na jihvārogaṃ na kāyarogam /
T01bsu019_u:915: na mleccheṣu na pāpakuleṣu norabhrikeṣu na kaukkuṭikeṣu na jatyeṣu(?) pratyājāyante /
T01bsu019_u:917: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ teṣāṃ yakṣarākṣasānāṃ tamondhakāravāsināṃ sarveṣāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān /
T01bsu019_u:918: te yakṣarākṣasāstāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śubhāṃ śrutvā kecit srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:921: ato yenāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evaṃ kathayanti - ihaiva bhagavan viharasva, mānyatra sthāne kvacidgaccha, vayaṃ te upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, vayaṃ ca tavāntike
T01bsu019_u:922: asminneva tamondhakārabhūmau tavārthāya divyāni sauvarṇamayāni caṃkramaṇāni kariṣyāmaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:923: mā bhagavannanyatra pradeśaṃ gacchasva, vayaṃ tavādarśanāt kathaṃ tiṣṭhāmaḥ? atha āryāvalokiteśvaro
T01bsu019_u:924: mahāsattvastāṃśca yakṣarākṣasānetadavocat - anekāni ca mayā kulaputrāḥ sattvāni bodhimārge niyojayitavyāni /
T01bsu019_u:925: atha te sarve yakṣarākṣasāḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:926: te parasparamevamāhuḥ - gamiṣyati ayamasmākamavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyataraṃ
T01bsu019_u:931: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti sma /
T01bsu019_u:935: te yakṣarākṣasāḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva ca prakrāntāḥ //
T01bsu019_u:943: tatra devanikāyeṣu sukuṇḍalo nāma devaputro daridro duścittaśceti /
T01bsu019_u:944: atha āryāvalokiteśvaraḥ sa tena brāhmaṇarūpeṇa tasya devaputrasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:945: upasaṃkramya sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ dāridryaduḥkhavyupaśamāya taṃ devaputrametadavocat - bubhukṣito 'haṃ tṛṣitaśceti /
T01bsu019_u:946: atha sa devaputro rudaṃstaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - na ca me brāhmaṇa kiṃcitsaṃvidyate /
T01bsu019_u:948: atha sa devaputro vimānaṃ praviśya sarvabhāṇḍaṃ nirabhyavekṣitumārabdhaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:949: sa ca paripatitaṃ niveśanaṃ divyairmahārhai ratnabhāṇḍaiḥ paripūrṇaṃ dakṣiṇapārśvam, anyāni ca bhāṇḍāni divyarasarasāgropetairāhāraiḥ paripūrṇāni vāmapārśve vimānasya vastrābharaṇaiḥ sarvapuṣpagandhādibhiḥ paripūrṇāni //
T01bsu019_u:950: atha sa devaputra etad dṛṣṭaivaṃ cintāmāpede - avaśyamayaṃ sa satpātro
T01bsu019_u:952: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇamāhūyaivamāha - ehi brāhmaṇa, idaṃ vimānaṃ praviśa /
T01bsu019_u:953: sa ca brāhmaṇastena devaputreṇa vimāne praviśya tairdivyaratnaiḥ
T01bsu019_u:956: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - bho brāhmaṇa, katamāyā bhūmyāstvamāgataḥ? brāhmaṇa āha - jetavananāmamahāvihārādahamāgataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:958: - kīdṛśī sā bhūmiḥ? atha sa brāhmaṇo devaputrametadavocat -
T01bsu019_u:959: tathāgatādhyuṣitā sā bhūmī ramaṇīyā divyamaṇiratnaparikhacitā pariśobhitā
T01bsu019_u:960: / paribhogāya ca tadbhūmau divyakalpavṛkṣāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ, manoramāṇi puṣpāṇi prādubharvanti, vividhāḥ puṣkariṇyo dṛśyante, vividhāśca śīlavanto guṇavanto dakṣiṇīyā dṛśyante viśvabhuvaḥ tathāgatasyānekāni prātihāryāṇi dṛśyante /
T01bsu019_u:962: atha sa devaputrastaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat - avaśyaṃ tvayā brāhmaṇa satyaṃ pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ
T01bsu019_u:963: / athavā tvaṃ devo 'si, manuṣyo 'si vā? na ca manuṣyasyedṛśaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati yādṛśaṃ tava nimittaṃ bhavati /
T01bsu019_u:965: na devaḥ, api tu mānuṣo 'haṃ bodhisattvabhūtaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:968: maulikuṇḍalamupanāmayati, upanāmayitvā ca sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ
T01bsu019_u:972: atha sa devaputra imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tatraiva prakrāntaḥ //
T01bsu019_u:977: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ tasmāddevanikāyādavatīrya siṃhaladvīpaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:978: gatvā ca rākṣasīnāṃ purato vyavasthitaḥ kāmarūpamātmānamabhinirmāya prāsādikam /
T01bsu019_u:979: atha tā rākṣasyo 'nyonyamevamāhuḥ - ayamīdṛśaṃ paramakāmarūpī puruṣo dṛśyate /
T01bsu019_u:980: atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ kāmacittamutpannam /
T01bsu019_u:982: bhavāṃstvaṃ bhajasva asmākaṃ kumārīyauvanam, na cāsmākaṃ svāmī saṃvidyate
T01bsu019_u:983: / tvaṃ ca bho puruṣa, asvāmikānāṃ svāmī bhava /
T01bsu019_u:989: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhāni vicitrāṇi śayanāni udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramayāṇi //
T01bsu019_u:990: sa kathayati - madīyamājñaptaṃ yadi kurute, tatsarvaṃ yuṣmākaṃ yathābhiprāyaṃ kariṣyāmi
T01bsu019_u:991: tāśca tamāhuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ tavājñāṃ na
T01bsu019_u:995: atha tā rākṣasyastasyapuruṣasyāntikādāryāṣṭāṅgikamārgaṃ gṛhītvā daśa kuśalāni ca saṃsmarya, satyacatuṣṭayaṃ prāptvā, āgamasatyacatuṣṭayādhītāḥ,
T01bsu019_u:998: kāścitpratyekabodhimanuprāptāḥ, tadā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ rāgaduḥkhaṃ na bādhate /
T01bsu019_u:1004: evaṃ cāhuḥ - punarapi na prāṇātipātaṃ kurvāmaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1005: yādṛśena jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā jīvanti annena pānena, tādṛśajīvikayā vayaṃ jīvāmaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1008: tādṛśaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaramupagṛhītvā tasyaiva puruṣasya purato 'nimiṣairnayanaiḥ prekṣamāṇāḥ prasthitāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1012: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmātsiṃhaladvīpādavatīrya vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāvasthāne gato yatrānekānyanekāni kṛmikulaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti /
T01bsu019_u:1013: tato 'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva upasaṃkramya tatrāsa tāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ bhramararūpamabhinirmāya ghuṇaghuṇāyamāṇam /
T01bsu019_u:1015: namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namaḥ saṃghāya iti /
T01bsu019_u:1016: tacchrutvā te ca sarve prāṇakāḥ namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāyeti nāmamanusmārayanti
T01bsu019_u:1017: te ca sarve buddhanāmasmaraṇamātreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā sarve te sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapannāḥ sugandhamukhā nāma bodhisattvā babhūvuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1018: sarve te bhagavato 'mitābhasya tathāgatasyāntikādidaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ nāma mahāyānaṃ śrutvā anumodya ca nānādigbhyo vyākaraṇāni pratilabdhāni //
T01bsu019_u:1020: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo sattvaparipākaṃ kṛtvā tasyā vārāṇasyā mahānagaryāḥ prakrāntaḥ //
T01bsu019_u:1026: yāvat sattvān paśyanti sma parasparaṃ māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇān /
T01bsu019_u:1027: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastānevamāha - kasmādbhoḥ, yūyaṃ anyonyaṃ māsaṃ bhakṣayatha? te cāhuḥ - nādyaiva māsaṃbhakṣaṇam,
T01bsu019_u:1028: viṃśativarṣāṇi paripūrṇāni kāntārasya ca pratipannasya ca /
T01bsu019_u:1032: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaścintāmāpede - kenopāyenāhaṃ sattvān sarvān
T01bsu019_u:1037: tadā paścāddivyāni piṣṭakāni rasarasāgropetāni tenāhāreṇa paripūrṇāni /
T01bsu019_u:1038: yadāhāreṇa saṃtarpitā bhavanti tadā dhānyavarṣāṇi patanti, anyāni ca tilataṇḍulakolamudgamāṣakalāvamasūrayavagodhūmaśālidhānyakulatthādīni patanti sma /
T01bsu019_u:1039: vividhāni ca vastrābharaṇāni ca pravarṣanti sma /
T01bsu019_u:1040: yadā yadā teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ ke 'pyabhiprāyā bhavanti, tadā tadā teṣāṃ
T01bsu019_u:1042: atha te māgadhakāḥ sattvāstadidaṃ vicitraṃ svātmasukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ ca vyupaśāntam, tadā paramavismayamāpannāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1043: te ca sarve ekasthāne viśrāntāḥ, viśramitvā parasparamevamāhuḥ - kasya devasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ? tatasteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ madhye jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ kubjo gopāṇasīvakro 'dhibhagno
T01bsu019_u:1045: sa teṣāṃ madhye sthitvā kathayati - na yuṣmākamanyadevasya kasyacidīdṛśaṃ prabhāvo bhavati virahitādavalokiteśvarasya /
T01bsu019_u:1046: tatastā parṣadaḥ pṛcchanti - kīdṛśaṃ tasya nimittamavalokiteśvarasya? atha sa puruṣa āryāvalokiteśvarasya guṇodbhāvanāṃ bhāṣitumārabdhaḥ -
T01bsu019_u:1050: bhayabhītānāmabhayaṃdadaḥ, vyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ vaidyabhūtaḥ, duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūtaḥ, avīcyupapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ nirvāṇapradarśakaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1052: sukhitāste sattvā loke ye tasya nāmamanusmaranti /
T01bsu019_u:1054: sacetanāste puruṣapuṃgavā ye avalokiteśvarasya satataparigrahaṃ puṣpadhūpaṃ niryātayanti /
T01bsu019_u:1055: ye 'valokiteśvarasya purataścaturasraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kurvanti, te rājāno bhavanti cakravartinaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgatāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1056: tadyathā - cakraratnam, aśvaratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam
T01bsu019_u:1057: evaṃ sapta ratnāni, ebhiḥ saptaratnaiḥ samanvāgatā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1060: yatra yatropapadyante tatra tatra parīpūrṇakāyāśca bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1062: tāśca parṣadaḥ svakasvakeṣu bhavaneṣu pratyudgatāḥ, anantavimalā nāma kāyapariśuddhiḥ
T01bsu019_u:1064: atha sa jīrṇapurūṣaḥ ānulomikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā svakaṃ gṛhaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1067: atha sa ākāśe cintāmāpede - viśvabhūstathāgato me cirakālaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ, so
T01bsu019_u:1071: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo bhagavantametadavocat - katamo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattva āgacchati? bhagavānāha - eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro
T01bsu019_u:1074: athāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vāmapārśve viśrāntaḥ //
T01bsu019_u:1075: atha sa punaḥ śrāntaṃ viditvā bhagavān pṛcchati - śrāntastvaṃ kulaputra /
T01bsu019_u:1076: kīdṛśī karmabhūmistvayā niṣpāditāḥ? tana tasya bhūtapūrvaṃ varṇitam - sadā preteṣvavīcyupapanneṣu kālasūtrarauravopapanneṣu hāhe tapane mahānarake,
T01bsu019_u:1077: sitodake mahānarake, asicchede mahānarake, saṃvare mahānarake /
T01bsu019_u:1078: eṣu mahānarakeṣu ye sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ ca karmabhūmiḥ sattvānāmaparipākakṛtā kartavyā, kṛtvā cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01bsu019_u:1081: atha gaganagañjo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramavismayamāpannaḥ - na ca me
T01bsu019_u:1082: bodhisattvabhūtasya īdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śruta vā, tathāgatānāmīdṛśaṃ viṣayaṃ na saṃvidyate
T01bsu019_u:1083: athe gaganagañjo bodhisattvo 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ sthitvā avalokiteśvaramevamāha - mā tvaṃ śrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1085: sa āha - na cāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ madhye śrānto na kliṣṭaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1086: tau parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitau //
T01bsu019_u:1087: atha bhagavān ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśaṃ dharmaṃ deśayitumārabdhaḥ - śṛṇvantu kulaputrāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1089: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā dhai(vī)ryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā paripūrayitavyā
T01bsu019_u:1090: imāṃ cānulomikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1092: prakrāntāḥ, te ca bodhisattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu prakrāntāḥ //
T01bsu019_u:1093: ayaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhamahāyānasūtraratnarājasya prathamo nirvyūhaḥ sarvakarmaviśodhano 'nuttarabodhimārgapratiṣṭhāpakaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 //
T01bsu019_u:1098: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyāhi bhagavan avalokiteśvarasya bhūtapurvaṃ kṛtamete samādhayaḥ, yairavalokiteśvaraḥ samāpannaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1099: bhagavānāha - aprameyairasaṃkhyeyaiḥ samādhikoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ samāpannau 'valokiteśvaraḥ, yeṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ (na) śakyaṃ sarvatathāgataiḥ paryantamadhigantum /
T01bsu019_u:1100: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī āha - nirdeśaya bhagavaṃstāni samādhīni
T01bsu019_u:1102: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ, prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ, vajrodgato nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1103: sūryaprabho nāma samādhiḥ, vikiriṇo nāma samādhiḥ, keyūro nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1104: dhvajāgro nāma samādhiḥ, alaṃkāro nāma samādhiḥ, vyūharājo nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1105: daśadigvyavalokano nāma samādhiḥ, cintāmaṇivaralocano nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1106: dharmadharo nāma samādhiḥ, samudrāvarohaṇo nāma samādhiḥ, abhinamito nāma samādhiḥ, uṣṇīṣakuṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ, candravaralocano nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1107: bahujanaparivāro nāma samādhiḥ, devakuṇḍalarocano nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1108: kalpadvīpo nāma samādhiḥ, prātihāryasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ, padmottamo nāma samādhiḥ, avīcisaṃśoṣaṇo nāma samādhiḥ, rucito nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1109: devamaṇḍalo nāma samādhi, amṛtabindurnāma samādhiḥ, prabhāmaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ, samudrāvagāhano nāma samādhiḥ, vimānanirvyūho nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1110: kalaviṅkasvaro nāma samādhiḥ, nīlotpalagandho nāma samādhiḥ, ārūḍho nāma samādhiḥ, vajrakuco nāma samādhiḥ, dviradarato nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1111: siṃhavikrīḍito nāma samādhiḥ, anuttaro nāma samādhiḥ, damano nāma samādhiḥ, candrottaryo nāma samādhiḥ, ābhāsakaro nāma samādhiḥ, śatakiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, vicchurito nāma samādhiḥ, prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1112: svākārakaro nāma samādhiḥ, asurasaṃcodano nāma samādhiḥ, bhavasaṃśodhano nāma samādhiḥ, nirvāṇasaṃcodano nāma samādhiḥ, mahādvīpo nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1113: dviparājo nāma samādhiḥ, bhavottārakaro nāma samādhiḥ, akṣarakaro nāma samādhiḥ, devābhimukho nāma samādhiḥ, yogakaro nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1114: paramārthadarśano nāma samādhiḥ, vidyunnāma samādhiḥ, nāmavyuho nāma samādhiḥ, siṃhavijṛmbhito nāma samādhiḥ, svātimukho nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1115: āgamanāgamano nāma samādhiḥ, buddhivisphuraṇo nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1116: smṛtīndriyasaṃvardhano nāma samādhiḥ, abhimukto nāma samādhiḥ, jayavāhano nāma samādhiḥ, mārgasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1117: ebhiṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ samādhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1120: īdṛśastathāgatānāṃ puṇyasaṃbhāro na saṃvidyate, prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtasya //
T01bsu019_u:1122: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra ahaṃ siṃhalarājo nāma bodhisattvabhūto 'bhūvam /
T01bsu019_u:1124: pañcabhirvaṇikputraśataiḥ sārdhaṃ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭharairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhādibhiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya siṃhaladvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1129: kathaya kathaya yuṣmākaṃ katamadvīpeṣu gamanāyedṛśā vāyavo vānti? athavā ratnadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti, athavā rākṣasadvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti? atha karṇadhāra evamāha - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - siṃhaladvīpeṣu vāyavo vānti /
T01bsu019_u:1131: tato 'haṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinībhī rākṣasībhiḥ saṃprasthito viditvā akālavāyava utsṛṣṭāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1133: te ca vaṇikpuruṣā udake patitā bāhubalena saṃtartumārabdhāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1135: tato rākṣasīnāṃ pañca śatāni niṣkrāntāni kilakilāyamānāni /
T01bsu019_u:1138: te ca svakīyāni vastrāṇi śarīre lagnāni gṛhītvā niṣpīḍitumārabdhāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1139: niṣpīḍayitvā te tasmātsthānādatikramya anyapradeśe mahataścampakavṛkṣasya tale viśrāntāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1140: viśramitvā parasparaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - ko 'smākamupāyaḥ saṃvidyate? te kathayanti
T01bsu019_u:1143: atha teṣāṃ rākṣasyaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ purataḥ sthitvaivamāhuḥ -
T01bsu019_u:1150: imāni te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi yānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi kaṭakakeyūrāṇāṃ maulikuṇḍalānāṃ gṛhāṇi udyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkiriṇīramaṇīyāni saṃtiṣṭhanti /
T01bsu019_u:1151: tābhī rākṣasībhirekaikaṃ puruṣaṃ gṛhītvā svakaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1153: vṛddhatarā, tayāhaṃ svakīyaṃ niveśanaṃ nītvā divyarasasāgropetenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1155: sa tu tato mānuṣyakena saukhyena saṃtarpitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1159: na kadācitsyānmayā dṛṣṭaṃ vā śrutaṃ vā prajvalitameva ratikarahasanam,
T01bsu019_u:1160: tadaiva mayā tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ hasase? iyaṃ siṃhaladvīpanivāsinī rākṣasī /
T01bsu019_u:1162: tadā me tasya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - tvaṃ jānāsi rākṣasīti? sa kathayati - yadi na pratīyasi, dakṣiṇapanthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran gaccha /
T01bsu019_u:1165: anye ca jīvanto anye ca mṛtāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1166: / yadi na pratīyasi, tadapi mārgaṃ gaccha /
T01bsu019_u:1169: tadā tasyāstena mohajālā nāma nidrāti sā //
T01bsu019_u:1171: atha sa bodhisattvo rātriprathamayāme samaye tasyā rākṣasyāḥ sakāśādutthāya saṃprasthitaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1176: atha tasminnāyase nagare mahān yaścampakavṛkṣastatraivāruhya tato mayā teṣāmutkāsanaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1177: tato me vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - yatkhalu mahāsārthavāho jānīyāt - vayaṃ rākṣasībhirāyase nagare prakṣiptāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1178: tadā dine dine śataṃ puruṣāṇāṃ gṛhītvā bhakṣayanti /
T01bsu019_u:1181: tadāhaṃ campakavṛkṣādavatīrya punareva dakṣiṇāṃ panthalikāṃ gṛhītvā anuvicaran tvarita āgacchāmi sma /
T01bsu019_u:1183: atha ratikaro māmetadavocat - dṛṣṭaste sārthavāha madvacanam? uktaṃ ca mayā - dṛṣṭaṃ yuṣmākaṃ satyaṃ sāṃkathyakṛtam /
T01bsu019_u:1184: tadā me 'sya pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyameva, ka upāyo 'smākam? atha sa ratikara etadavocat - asti me mahāsārthavāhopāyam, yenopāyena siṃhaladvīpāt svastikṣemābhyāṃ jambūdvīpaṃ nirgacchasi punareva jambudvīpamapasarasi /
T01bsu019_u:1185: atha sa ratikaro māmetadavocat - asti tasminneva dvīpe mahāsamudratīre devabālāho nāmāśvarājo hīnadīnānukampakaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1187: sarvaśvetānāmauṣadhīṃ bhuktvā suvarṇavālukāsthale āvartanaparivartanasaṃparivartanaṃ kṛtvā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati,
T01bsu019_u:1188: pracchoḍayitvā pratyāhāraṃ kurute - kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1189: pāragāmīti? tvayaivaṃ vaktavyam - ahaṃ deva pāragāmīti /
T01bsu019_u:1190: evaṃ sāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā sā rākṣasī samīpamupagamya sārdhaṃ śayita eva prativibuddhā /
T01bsu019_u:1191: sā kathayati - āryaputra, kathaṃ te śarīraṃ śītalam? tadā mayā tasyā
T01bsu019_u:1196: tataḥ prātaḥ sūryasya cābhyudgamanakālasamaye utthāya teṣāṃ vaṇikpurūṣāṇāmārocayati sma
T01bsu019_u:1198: te sarve sahitāḥ samagrā bahirnagarasya saṃprasthitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1199: te ca bahirnagarasya gatvā ekānte viśrāntāḥ sāṃkathyaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ - kasya kīdṛśī bhāryā snehavatī? kecitkathayanti
T01bsu019_u:1208: tadā teṣāṃ vaṇikpuruṣāṇāṃ pratyāhāraṃ karoti sma - na yuṣmākaṃ yuktamidaṃ
T01bsu019_u:1212: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - satyaṃ satyaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaṃ, neyaṃ mānuṣī,
T01bsu019_u:1214: atha te vaṇikpuruṣāḥ kathayanti - kāsmākaṃ gatiḥ? kiṃ parāyaṇam?
T01bsu019_u:1215: tadā teṣāṃ mayā pratyāhāraḥ kṛtaḥ - asmākaṃ gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam?
T01bsu019_u:1217: atha sa teṣāmevamāha - asti yuṣmākaṃ siṃhaladvīpe bālāho nāma aśvarājaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1220: kṛtvā ca śarīraṃ pracchoḍayitvā vāṇīṃ pratyāharediti -
T01bsu019_u:1221: kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmī kaḥ pāragāmīti /
T01bsu019_u:1223: atha te vaṇikpurūṣā ūcuḥ - katame dine gacchāmo vayam?
T01bsu019_u:1224: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase 'vaśyaṃ gantavyam /
T01bsu019_u:1226: te kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā punareva tannagaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ svakasvakaṃ niveśanamupagatā /
T01bsu019_u:1228: śrāntastvam, dṛṣṭāste tānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni? sa kathayati - na ca te kiṃcid dṛṣṭam /
T01bsu019_u:1229: atha sā rākṣasī tametadavocat - santi āryaputra vividhānyasmin siṃhaladvīpe udyānaramaṇīyāni
T01bsu019_u:1232: sa pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhaḥ - tṛtīye divase gamiṣyāmītyataḥ saṃbalaṃ kartavyam /
T01bsu019_u:1234: tāni ca vividhāni puṣkariṇīśatāni ramaṇīyāni udyānaśatāni puṣpaparipūrṇāni paśyāmi /
T01bsu019_u:1235: tāni ca vividhāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā āgamiṣyāmi /
T01bsu019_u:1244: sā kathayati rākṣasī - āryaputra kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ucchvāsaṃ choritam? atha sa tāmetadavocat - svadeśābhiratā jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1245: sā āha - kiṃ karoṣyāryaputra svakīyena viṣayena?
T01bsu019_u:1246: asminneva siṃhaladvīpe vividhānyannagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi vividhānyudyānaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni /
T01bsu019_u:1251: tṛtīye divase pratyūṣakālasamaye sarve te saṃprasthitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1254: na punaḥ kenacit punareva siṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1256: īdṛśaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā saṃprasthitāḥ tvaritaṃ tvaritameva laghu laghveva gacchanti /
T01bsu019_u:1263: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayati tadā siṃhaladvīpaṃ calati sma /
T01bsu019_u:1264: trīṇi vākyāni pratyāharati sma - kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmī, kaḥ pāragāmīti? atha sa bālāho
T01bsu019_u:1266: yadā śarīraṃ pracchoḍayāmi, na tadā yuṣmākaṃ kenacitsiṃhaladvīpo nirīkṣitavyaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1271: yadā te ārūḍhāḥ tadā siṃhaladvīpanivāsinyo rākṣasyaḥ kilakilāyamānāḥ pṛṣṭhato dhāvanti sma rudantyaḥ karuṇakaruṇairvilāpaiḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1275: yadā te udake patitāḥ, tadā rākṣasya utkṣipya māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti sma /
T01bsu019_u:1277: / tadā tīrasya samīpe bālāhamaśvarājaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1280: tadā me mātāpitārau kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya roditumārabdhau /
T01bsu019_u:1288: jarākāle yaṣṭibhūto 'ndhakāre mārgasyopadarśakaḥ, maraṇakāle piṇḍadātā, mṛtasya sanāthīkaraṇīyam
T01bsu019_u:1289: yathā śītalo vāto nāma putra āhlādakaraḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1292: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bālāhakaṃ tamaśvarājabhūtenāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tādṛśādahaṃ mṛtyubhayātparimokṣitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1293: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin na śaknomyavalokiteśvarasya puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:1298: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram /
T01bsu019_u:1300: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante /
T01bsu019_u:1303: tatra na ca te rāgeṇa bādhyante /
T01bsu019_u:1310: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin suvarṇanāmaromavivare avabhāsaṃ nāma cintāmaṇiratnam
T01bsu019_u:1311: yadā te gandharvā abhiprāyaṃ cintayanti, tadā teṣāmabhiprāyo 'nusidhyati /
T01bsu019_u:1318: parvatāḥ, rūpyamayāḥ śṛṅgāḥ, padmarāgairupacitāḥ parvatāḥ, tādṛśāḥ saptasaptatiparvatāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1329: yadā te vādyapratyāhāramudīrayanti, tadā mṛgapakṣyādayaḥ saṃvegamāpadyante - sukhaduḥkhamidaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ sattvānām /
T01bsu019_u:1331: paśyanti? iṣṭapriyaviyogamapriyasaṃprayogaṃ paśyanti? mānuṣyakāṇi bahūni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? ityevaṃ te mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ saṃvegamanuvicintya yadā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti, tadā teṣāṃ divyarasarasāgropetā āhārāḥ prādurbhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1337: bhagavānāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kulaputra paramavismayamāpannaḥ? atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhasya
T01bsu019_u:1339: yasya nāmadheyamātreṇa īdṛśāni vastūni prādurbhavanti, sukhitāste sattvā ye kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti, yoniśaṃ ca manasi kariṣyanti /
T01bsu019_u:1340: ye kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtrarājasyaikākṣaramapi likhāpayiṣyanti, te idaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti /
T01bsu019_u:1343: na ca te khañjakubjakordhvanāsagaṇḍalamboṣṭhāśca sattvāḥ kuṣṭhinaśca santaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1344: na ca teṣāṃ kāye vyādhiḥ saṃkramate /
T01bsu019_u:1349: anekāni devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyā upāsakopāsikāsahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni - tvayedṛśaṃ dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kṛtam /
T01bsu019_u:1351: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavannidaṃ praśnamanirdiṣṭaṃ tadā devaputrāṇāmabhedyā śraddhotpannā /
T01bsu019_u:1352: atha bhagavān sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvamevaṃ punaḥ punastathāgatamadhyeṣase
T01bsu019_u:1353: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin kṛṣṇānnāma romavivarādavatīrya ratnakuṇḍalo nāma romavivaraḥ
T01bsu019_u:1355: tāśca gandharvakanyā abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitaśarīrā apsarasāmiva pratispardhinyaḥ tādṛśyaḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1360: na ca tāsāṃ kāye kiṃcinmānuṣīduḥkhaṃ saṃvidyate /
T01bsu019_u:1362: yadā trikālamanusmaranti, tadā tāsāṃ sarvavastūni prādurbhavanti //
T01bsu019_u:1366: yathā ākāśadhāturagrāhyo 'saṃsparśaḥ, evameva te kulaputra romavivarā agrāhyā asaṃsparśāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1367: teṣu romavivareṣu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ romavivarāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi
T01bsu019_u:1368: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāṇi /
T01bsu019_u:1369: yasyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśatam, tenāpi na dṛṣṭāṇi, prāgevānye bodhisattvabhūtāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1370: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi
T01bsu019_u:1371: paribhramatā, na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāni, asyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśataṃ tenāpi na dṛṣṭam, tadā teṣāṃ romavivarāṇāmantato
T01bsu019_u:1372: 'hamapi kiṃ gamiṣyāmi? āha - kulaputra, mayāpi tasya romavivaraṃ
T01bsu019_u:1375: kulaputra, ayaṃ māyāvī asādhyaḥ sūkṣma evamanudṛśyate /
T01bsu019_u:1376: nirañjano rūpī mahāpī(?) śatasahasrabhujaḥ koṭiśatasahasranetro viśvarūpī ekādaśaśīrṣaḥ mahāyogī nirvāṇabhūmivyavasthitaḥ sucetano mahāprājñaḥ bhavottārakaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1377: kulīno 'nādarśī prājño nirdeśastathācchāyābhūtaḥ sarvadharmeṣu, evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo na śruto na kenacid dṛśyate /
T01bsu019_u:1378: tasya svabhāvakā anyathārtagatā na paśyanti, prāgeva samantabhadrādayo 'nye ca bodhisattvāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1381: anekāni ca bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paripācayati, sattvāṃśca tān bodhimārge
T01bsu019_u:1385: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kenopāyena bhagavan paśyāmi ahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam? bhagavānāha - yadi kulaputra ihaiva sahālokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
T01bsu019_u:1387: anujānāmyahaṃ bhagavan, avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgacchati?
T01bsu019_u:1388: bhagavānāha - yadā kulaputra sattvaparipāko bhavati, tadāvalokiteśvaraḥ prathamataramāgacchati
T01bsu019_u:1389: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ - kiṃ mayā pāparatena cirakālajīvikayā tenāvalokiteśvaradarśanaviprahīṇenāndhabhūtena tamonuprāptamārgasaṃprasthitena? atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1391: āgacchati? atha bhagavānapīdaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā hasati, vyavahasati ca -
T01bsu019_u:1393: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra tato romavivarādavatīrya amṛtabindurnāma romavivaraḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1397: kecidaṣṭabhūmikāḥ, kecinnavabhūmikāḥ, keciddaśabhūmikāḥ pratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vasanti /
T01bsu019_u:1398: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin asminnamṛtabindau romavivare ṣaṣṭiparvatāḥ suvarṇarūpyamayāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1402: teṣu parvatarājiṣu anekāni gandharvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi prativasanti, ye tasmin romavivare satatasamitaṃ nirnāditaṃ sūryaṃ dhārayati /
T01bsu019_u:1403: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmiṃścāmṛtabindau romavivare anekāni vimānakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnaparikhacitāni śobhanīyāni darśanīyāni vicitrāṇi muktāhāraśatasahasrāṇi pralambitāni teṣu vimāneṣu bodhisattvā viśramitvā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti /
T01bsu019_u:1405: caṃkrame caṃkrame saptati saptati puṣkariṇyaḥ kecidaṣṭāṅgopetena vāriṇā paripūrṇāḥ, kecidvividhapuṣpaparipūrṇāḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1407: / teṣu caṃkrameṣu manoramāḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ lohitavarṇāḥ suvarṇarūpyapatrā
T01bsu019_u:1411: bodhisattvāścaṃkramanti, vividhaṃ ca mahāyānamanusmaranti, nairvāṇikīṃ bhūmimanuvicintayanti
T01bsu019_u:1415: evameva sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmin romavivare īdṛśā bodhisattvā vasanti /
T01bsu019_u:1420: satatakālaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ ekāgradharmamaitrīvihārikāḥ kṣāntisaṃbhāvitā nirvāṇacintakāḥ saṃvegamānuṣyakāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1424: īdṛśāni ca tatra kulaputra romavivare saddharmanimittāni ca dṛśyante /
T01bsu019_u:1427: puṣkariṇīśatasahasrāṇi, divyāni vimānāni, sphaṭikarajatasaṃyuktāḥ paramaśobhanīyāḥ ramaṇīyāḥ prāsādāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1434: evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā svakasvakāni caṃkramaṇāni caṃkramanti /
T01bsu019_u:1436: teṣu caṃkrameṣu sāmantakeṣu kalpavṛkṣā lohitadaṇḍāḥ sauvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitāḥ maulikuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitā ratnahārapralambitāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1447: ye cāvīcāvupapannā rauravopapannāḥ, kālasūtropapannāḥ, hāhave mahānarake upapannāḥ, pratāpane narake upapannāḥ, agnighaṭeṣupapannāḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1451: evameva kulaputra kinnarā dharmābhiratāḥ satatakālamavalokiteśvarasya nāmanusmaranti /
T01bsu019_u:1452: yadā te nāmānusmaranti, tadā teṣāṃ sarvopakaraṇairupasthitā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1453: evaṃ durlabhaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūtaḥ sarvasattveṣvabhayaṃdadaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1462: teṣāṃ teṣu romavivareṣu tāvattiṣṭhanti yāvannairvāṇikīṃ bhūmimanveṣante //
T01bsu019_u:1466: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkabhī bhagavantametadavocat - kuto bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarī
T01bsu019_u:1467: mahāvidyā prāpyate? bhagavānāha - durlabhā kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā /
T01bsu019_u:1468: na ca tathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1469: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na jānanti? bhagavānāha - kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī
T01bsu019_u:1471: yaśca paramahṛdayaṃ jānāti sa mokṣaṃ jānāti /
T01bsu019_u:1473: asti bhagavan kecitsattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ jānanti? bhagavānāha -
T01bsu019_u:1476: eṣā durāsadā aprameyā yoginastathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1477: asyāḥ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena sarve tathāgatāḥ ṣoḍaśakalyāṇasaṃkhyeyāḥ paribhramitāḥ prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ kuto jānanti? ayaṃ sa paramahṛdayaḥ avalokiteśvarasya /
T01bsu019_u:1480: puṇyavantaste sattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ satataparigrahaṃ japābhiyuktā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1482: paramāṇurajopamā bodhisattvāḥ saṃnipatanti, ṣaṭpāramitā dvārasthā bhavanti
T01bsu019_u:1493: viśramitvā sādhukāramanuprayanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvamīdṛśaṃ cintāmaṇiratnalabdhalābho 'si /
T01bsu019_u:1495: ye ca tava kulaputra kukṣigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ, sarve te 'vaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti
T01bsu019_u:1496: yaḥ kaścidimāṃ dhārayet ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ kāyagatāṃ kaṇṭhagatāṃ vā, sa kulaputra vajrakāyaśarīra
T01bsu019_u:1497: veditavyaḥ, dhātustūpa iti veditavyaḥ, tathāgatajñānakoṭiriti veditavyaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1498: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti so
T01bsu019_u:1504: yasya kasyaciducchavasyocchvāsapraśvāsaṃ dadāti maitryā vā dveṣeṇa vā, sarve te 'vaivartikādhisattvā bhavanti, kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
T01bsu019_u:1507: darśanamātreṇa strī vā puruṣo vā dārikā vā mṛgapakṣiṇo gomahiṣagardabhādayaśca cakṣurdarśanenāpi
T01bsu019_u:1508: paśyanti, sarve te caramabhavikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1511: evaṃ tu ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japamānasya saṃcodano bhavati //
T01bsu019_u:1512: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan labheyamahaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyām? so 'cintyo yogānāṃ cāprameyadhyānānāṃ ca aparisthitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau, nirvāṇasyopadarśakaḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1513: mokṣasya praveśanam, rāgadveṣasya vyupaśamanam, dharmarājasya ca paripūraṇam, unmūlanaṃ ca saṃsārasya pañcagatikasya, saṃśoṣaṇaṃ ca nārakāṇāṃ kleśānām, samuddhātanamuttāraṇaṃ ca tiryagyonigatānām, āsvādo dharmāṇāṃ ca paripūraṇam, sarvajñajñānasya akṣayaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrotumicchāmi
T01bsu019_u:1514: / bhagavan yo me ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāmanuprayacchati, tasya caturdvīpān saptaratnaparipūrṇānniryātayitum
T01bsu019_u:1515: yadi bhagavan likhyamānāyāpi bhūrjaṃ na saṃvidyate, na masiḥ, na ca karamam /
T01bsu019_u:1517: carmamutpāṭya bhūrjaṃ kuryāt, asthiṃ bhaṅktavā ca karamaṃ kuryāt, tadāpi bhagavan mama nāsti khedaṃ śarīrasya /
T01bsu019_u:1518: sa ca me mātāpitṛbhūto bhavet gurūṇāmapi guruśca //
T01bsu019_u:1520: smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra asyāḥ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena paramāṇurajopamān lokadhātūn paribhramitaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1522: na ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśātsacālaṃbāpi (?) śrutā /
T01bsu019_u:1524: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
T01bsu019_u:1526: tadā tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhihitam - mā kulaputra evaṃ karuṇakarūṇānyaśrūṇi pramuñca /
T01bsu019_u:1527: gaccha kulaputra yena padmottamo nāma lokadhātuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1531: tasya kulaputra ahaṃ ratnottamasya tathāgatasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1533: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastātprāñjalībhūtvottam - labheyamahaṃ bhagavan
T01bsu019_u:1534: ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīṃ yasyā nāmānusmaraṇamātreṇa sarvapāpāni
T01bsu019_u:1535: kṣayante, durlabhāṃ bodhiṃ pratilabhate, yenārthenāhaṃ kliṣṭo 'nekāni
T01bsu019_u:1538: tadā padmottamastathāgata imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāguṇāṃ saṃsmārayati sma -
T01bsu019_u:1539: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate paramāṇurajaḥpramāṇamudgṛhītum, na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum
T01bsu019_u:1540: / śakyate mayā kulaputra catuḥsamudrasyaikaikāṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum, na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ
T01bsu019_u:1542: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo bhavet /
T01bsu019_u:1543: sa gṛhaṃ pūrṇaṃ yojanasahasraṃ kuryāt dviguṇaṃ pañcayojanaśatāni /
T01bsu019_u:1545: yatra sūcīvivaraṃ na saṃvidyate, tatra puruṣo dvāre
T01bsu019_u:1548: tadanena paryāyeṇa taṃ gṛhasamūhapratiṣṭhitāstilāḥ parikṣayaparyavadānaṃ yāvatkālena vrajeyuḥ, tacchakyate mayā gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1549: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1550: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpe nānāvidhāni kṛṣiṃ kārayanti yavagodhūmaśālimudgamāṣādayastilakolakulatthādibhiḥ, tatra kālena kālaṃ nāgarājāno varṣadhārāmanuprayacchanti /
T01bsu019_u:1551: tāni śasyāni niṣpādyante, tataste paripakkāḥ parichidyante /
T01bsu019_u:1553: kuryāt, tataste śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ piṭhakairgobhirgardabhādibhirlaṅghayitvā tasmin khalābhyantare
T01bsu019_u:1554: prakṣiperan, tāni gobhirgardabhairmardayitvā mahāntaṃ rāśiṃ niṣpādyate /
T01bsu019_u:1555: śakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikāni phalāni gaṇayitum, na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1556: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra imā mahānadyo jambudvīpe pravahanti rātrau divā ca /
T01bsu019_u:1557: tadyathā gaṅgā sītā yamunā sindhuḥ śatadruḥ candrabhāgā erāvatī sumāgandhā himaratī kalaśodarī ceti /
T01bsu019_u:1559: rātrau ca divā ca mahāsamudre pravahanti /
T01bsu019_u:1561: tatrāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ śakyate mayā ekaikabinduṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1562: na ca kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1563: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpeṣu catuṣpājjātīnāṃ gogardabhamahiṣāśvahastinaḥ, śvajambukacchāgalapaśavaḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1565: śakyate gaṇayitum, na tu kulaputra ṣaḍākṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1566: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vajrāṅkuśo nāma parvatarājo navanavatiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt /
T01bsu019_u:1568: tasya ca pārśve parvatarājasya jarāmaraḥ puruṣo bhavet /
T01bsu019_u:1570: evaṃ kṛtvā tasya parikṣayaṃ paryavadānaṃ bhavet, etatkāleṣu varṣamāsadinamuhūrtanāḍīkalāḥ yāvat śvāsāḥ, teṣāṃ pramāṇaṃ kartuṃśakyam, na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1571: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudraṃ caturaśītiyojanasahasraṃ gāmbhīryeṇa, aprameyaṃ vaipulyena vaḍavāmukhaparyantaṃ śakyate mayā śatāgrabhinnayā vālagrakoṭyā ekaikaṃ
T01bsu019_u:1573: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1574: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasya ekaikapatrāṇi gaṇayitum, na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandham gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1575: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvipanivāsinaṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1576: yatteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyaskandham, tataḥ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandham
T01bsu019_u:1577: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa adhimāsikena trayodaśamāsikena vā saṃvatsareṇa tathā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā pūrṇa kalpaṃ devo ratrau divā varṣati, tacchakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1578: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1579: evaṃ kulaputra bahavo matsadṛśāḥ tathāgatakoṭaya ekasthānadhāritā divyaṃ kalpaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇopasthāne nopasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1580: na ca tathāgatāḥ śaknuvanti ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum /
T01bsu019_u:1583: sa ca sūkṣmo dharmaḥ, avyakto dharmaṃ, anāgato
T01bsu019_u:1586: evaṃ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā upāyakauśalyaṃ prāptumahamapi kulaputra anekāni lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1587: gatvā cāmitābhasya tathāgatasya purastātprāñjalībhūtvā dharmavegenāśrūṇi pramuktāni,
T01bsu019_u:1589: tena mamābhihitam - kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīmicchasi
T01bsu019_u:1591: yathā tṛṣārtaḥ pānīyamanveṣate evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ samanveṣamāṇo
T01bsu019_u:1594: tathāgatakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi, na kasyacitsakāśānmayā labdhā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī
T01bsu019_u:1595: tvaṃ bhagavan trātā bhava, śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam /
T01bsu019_u:1602: athāmitābhasya tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya lambikarutena svareṇa nirghoṣeṇārocayati -
T01bsu019_u:1610: atha avalokiteśvaro bhagavantametadavocat - adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya na dātavyāṃ
T01bsu019_u:1612: saṃjānīte? kathaṃ sarvarājendrāṃ saṃjānīte? maṇḍalapariśuddhiṃ kathaṃ saṃjānīte? maṇḍalasyedaṃ nimittaṃ caturasraṃ pañcahastapramāṇaṃ sāmantakena madhye maṇḍalasyāmitābhaṃ likhet /
T01bsu019_u:1613: indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ marakatacūrṇaṃ sphāṭikacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇānyamitābhasya tathāgatasya kāye saṃyojayitavyāni /
T01bsu019_u:1615: vāmapārśve ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kartavyā caturbhujā śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇā, nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā
T01bsu019_u:1618: dau hastau saṃprayuktau sarvarājendrā nāma mudrā kartavyā /
T01bsu019_u:1622: tasya ca maṇḍalasya caturdvāreṣu catvāro mahārājāḥ kartavyāḥ, nānāpraharaṇagṛhītāḥ kartavyāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1624: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā icchati maṇḍalaṃ praveṣṭum, tena sarvagotrasyāparaṃparasya nāmāni likhitavyāni, likhitvā ca haste
T01bsu019_u:1635: yadi kulaputra indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇaṃ daridrasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā na saṃvidyante tāni cūrṇāni,
T01bsu019_u:1637: yadi kulaputra tadapi na saṃvidyate deśāntaragatasya sthānapadacyutasya, tadācāryeṇa mānasikaṃ
T01bsu019_u:1643: atha padmottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho avalokiteśvarametadavocat - dadasva me kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīm,
T01bsu019_u:1647: atha avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāmanuprayacchati -
T01bsu019_u:1649: yasmin kāle iyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā anupradattā, tadā catvāro dvīpāḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1650: sadevabhavanaparyantāḥ kadalīpatreva saṃcalitāḥ, kṣubdhāścatvāro mahāsamudrāḥ sarvavighnavināyakāḥ
T01bsu019_u:1652: atha padmottamena tathāgatena bhujaṃgasadṛśaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya avalokiteśvarasya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāram, tena gṛhītvā amitābhasya
T01bsu019_u:1654: tena gṛhītvā tasya padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyopanāmitam /
T01bsu019_u:1655: atha padmottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ gṛhītvā yena patrottamo nāma lokadhātustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1656: evaṃ kulaputra mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ padmottamasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasva sakāśācchrutam
T01bsu019_u:1657: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan labheyaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyā rājñīṃ prāptayogasya? yathā hi bhagavannamṛtasya labdhāsvādāstṛptiṃ na labhante, evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāśrutamātreṇa tṛptiṃ na labhāma /
T01bsu019_u:1658: puṇyavantaste sattvā ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti śṛṇvanti cintayanti adhyāśayena dhārayanti //
T01bsu019_u:1659: bhagavānāha - kulaputra, yaścemāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ likhāpayet, tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:1660: paramāṇurajopamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ divyasauvarṇaratnamayān stūpān kārayet, kārayitvā ekadine dhātvāvaropaṇaṃ
T01bsu019_u:1662: yaśca teṣāṃ phalavipākaḥ, sa ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekasyākṣarasya
T01bsu019_u:1665: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japet, sa imān samādhīn
T01bsu019_u:1667: tadyathā - maṇidharo nāma samādhiḥ, narakatiryaksaṃśodhanaṃ nāma samādhiḥ, vajrakavaco nāma samādhiḥ, supratiṣṭhitacaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvopāyakauśalyapraveśano nāma samādhiḥ, vikiriṇo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvabuddhakṣetrasaṃdarśano nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmapraveśano nāma samādhiḥ, dhyānālaṃkāro nāma samādhiḥ dharmarathābhirūḍho nāma samādhiḥ, rāgadveṣamohaparimokṣaṇo nāma samādhiḥ, anantavatso nāma samādhiḥ, ṣaṭpāramitānirdeśo nāma samādhiḥ, mahāmerudharo nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1668: sarvabhavottāraṇo nāma samādhiḥ, sarvatathāgatavyavalokano nāma samādhiḥ,
T01bsu019_u:1671: pratilabhate, ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ dhārayati //
T01bsu019_u:1676: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat - kutrāhaṃ bhagavan gaccheyaṃ yatra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ labheyam? bhagavānāha - asti kulaputra vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ dharmabhāṇako ya imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ dhārayati vācayati yoniśaśca manasi kurute /
T01bsu019_u:1678: gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavan vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ tasya dharmabhāṇakasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
T01bsu019_u:1690: na ca kulaputra tvayā dharmabhāṇakaṃ dṛṣṭvā vicikitsācittamutpādayitavyam /
T01bsu019_u:1691: mā tvaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvabhūmeścyutvā adāye prapatsyase /
T01bsu019_u:1692: sa ca dharmabhāṇakaḥ śīlavipannaḥ ācaravipanno bhāryāputraduhitṛbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ kāṣāyoccāraprasrāvaparipūrṇaḥ asaṃvṛtteryāpathaḥ //
T01bsu019_u:1694: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvo mahāsattva anekairbodhisattvaparṣadgṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitairdārakadārikādibhiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1695: tasya dharmabhāṇakasya pūjākarmaṇe divyāni chatrāṇi divyāni upānahāni maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmakeyūrahārārdhahāraratnahāraskandhopariṣvajānikapṛṣṭhottaryāṇi aṅguṣṭhavibhedikāni anyāni ca vividhāni vastrāṇi cīvarādhyuṣitāni vidyādharasaṃcoditāni kāśikavastrāṇyagniśaucavastrāṇi ca anyāni ca
T01bsu019_u:1698: utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndāravamahāmāndāravāṇi mañjūṣakamahāmañjūṣakāṇi caudumbarāṇi anyāni vividhāni kāṣṭhapuṣpāṇi campakakaravīrapāṭalāni muktakavārṣikāṇi śakunakādhyuṣitāni /
T01bsu019_u:1701: anyāni ca sthalajalajāni puṣpāṇi vividhāni gṛhītvā yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopajagāma /
T01bsu019_u:1704: upasaṃkramya pādau śirasābhivandya sa tena dṛṣṭaḥ śīlavipanna ācāravipanno 'saṃvṛteryāpathaḥ
T01bsu019_u:1706: tairvastrābharaṇaiḥ gandhamālyaiśca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tasya dharmabhāṇakasya purastātprāñjalībhūtaḥ tadvijñamidamavocat - aho dharmanidhānāsvādako 'mṛtanidhiriva saṃcaya anavagāho 'si, sāgaro yathā bhājanabhūto 'si sarvamānuṣyabhūteṣu eva te /
T01bsu019_u:1707: tava sakāśāddharmaṃ deśayataḥ devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ sarve te saṃnipatitāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1708: tava dharmaśravaṇakāle mahāvajrasamaye dharmaparyāyaṃ nirdiśasi parimokṣayasi /
T01bsu019_u:1710: puṇyavantaste sattvāḥ ye 'syāṃ vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vasanti, paśyanti, tava satataṃ parigrahaṃ kurvanti /
T01bsu019_u:1717: athe sa dharmabhāṇakastasyaitadavocat - mā tvaṃ kulaputra
