T01bsu019_u:1719: kati māṣāḥ kleṣā aupabhogikāḥ saṃsārasya naimittikāḥ prajāmaṇḍalasyotpādikāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:1720: ye ca kulaputrāḥ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ jānante, na ca te rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena saṃlipyante
T01bsu019_u:1721: yathā jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya na sajjate malam, evameva kulaputra yasya ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kāyagatā, na tasya kāyena na rāgeṇa na dveṣeṇa na mohena saṃlipyate //
T01bsu019_u:1729: abhedyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ pratilambha iti sarvajanāḥ kathayanti vākyaṃ madhuropacayam /
T01bsu019_u:1730: evaṃ gururdadasva me ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyārājñīṃ yenāhaṃ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaveyam /

T01bsu019_u:2072: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T01bsu019_u:2073: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:2075: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ
T01bsu019_u:2076: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram /
T01bsu019_u:2077: bhagavānāha - ye bhikṣava upasaṃpadābhāvamicchanti, taiḥ prathamataraṃ gatvā āvāsaṃ samyagavalokayitavyam
T01bsu019_u:2079: śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse 'sthīni saṃvidyante /
T01bsu019_u:2085: kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam, prāgeva jñapticaturtham
T01bsu019_u:2087: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:2092: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti? bhagavānāha - tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti, ye vihāre gṛhisaṃjñāṃ dhārayiṣyanti /
T01bsu019_u:2094: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante
T01bsu019_u:2095: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti, te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante /
T01bsu019_u:2096: ye sāṃghikaṃ dantakāṣṭhamasatparibhogena paribhuñjante, te kūrmamakaramatsyeṣu jāyante /
T01bsu019_u:2098: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:2106: svakīyalomasaṃkucitakāyā uttiṣṭhanti, tadā māṃsapiṇḍā bhūmau patanti /
T01bsu019_u:2108: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:2109: ye sāṃghikīṃ bhūmimasatparibhogena paribhuñjante, te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante
T01bsu019_u:2114: anyānyapi sarveṇa sarvaṃ dahyante, avaśeṣaṃ gacchanti /
T01bsu019_u:2115: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti /
T01bsu019_u:2117: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati /
T01bsu019_u:2119: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:2121: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti /
T01bsu019_u:2124: tasyāmagnikhadāyāmutkṣipya mahatīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ kṣipanti, tadapi kālaṃ na kurvanti, tadanyanarakeṣupapadyante
T01bsu019_u:2125: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante /
T01bsu019_u:2128: ye bhikṣavaḥ śikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtāśca bhavanti, taiḥ imāni trīṇi cīvarāṇi dhārayitavyāni /
T01bsu019_u:2129: ekaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghasya viśvāsena saṃghaparibhogāya, tathā dvitīyaṃ cīvaraṃ rājakuladvāragamanāya ca, tṛtīyaṃ cīvaraṃ grāmanagaranigamapallīpattaneṣu ca /
T01bsu019_u:2131: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni
T01bsu019_u:2132: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam /
T01bsu019_u:2136: viṣasya pratīkāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate, na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ
T01bsu019_u:2139: ye bhikṣavo dhārayanti, te pratimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
T01bsu019_u:2144: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ /
T01bsu019_u:2145: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ /
T01bsu019_u:2146: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ, sarve te prakrāntāḥ
T01bsu019_u:2148: idamavocadbhagavān, te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
T01bsu019_u:2151: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
T01bsu019_u:2152: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
